function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate air filtration due to low MERV filters","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne disease transmission","Mitigation":"Upgrade filters to MERV, inspect and maintain local exhaust ventilation","Technologies":"MERV filters, local exhaust ventilation systems","People":"Building occupants, staff, visitors","Owner":"Building engineer, HVAC specialist"},{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation and air circulation","Impact":"Higher concentration of pathogens in the air","Mitigation":"Circulate outside air, increase exhaust ventilation, use portable HEPA air cleaners","Technologies":"Air circulation systems, exhaust ventilation systems, HEPA air cleaners","People":"Building occupants, staff, visitors","Owner":"Building engineer, HVAC specialist"},{"Description":"Use of ozone generators, electrostatic precipitators, and ionizers","Impact":"Production of harmful by-products","Mitigation":"Do not use ozone generators, electrostatic precipitators, or ionizers","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Building occupants, staff, visitors","Owner":"Building engineer, HVAC specialist"}]}
